content: Weird, on my ++ feed the audio for https://changelog.com/friends/100 had an interview with the guy making the vibes site (cant remember his name), then I deleted that episode in overcast, downloaded it again, and its the correct audio about bikes. Anyway, looking forward to the bikes episode ...
Haha yeah we uploaded the wrong audio at first, then fixed it but apps that already had the mp3 local need to delete and re-download (there's no way to tell podcast apps to update your file, sadly)
